00067         header.append(file_name);
00068         header.append(".\n");
00069 
00070         header.append("  * \\date    ");
00071         time_t rawtime;
00072         struct tm *timeinfo;
00073         time (&rawtime);
00074         timeinfo = localtime (&rawtime);
00075         header.append(asctime (timeinfo));
00076 
00077         header.append("  * \\author  Kilmurray, Gerardo Luis <gerakilmurray@gmail.com>\n");
00078         header.append("  * \\author  Picco, Gonzalo Martin <gonzalopicco@gmail.com>\n");
00079         header.append("*/\n\n");
00080

00082 
00083         header.append("#ifndef _");
00084         header.append(name_upper);
00085         header.append("_HPP_\n");

00087         header.append(name_upper);
00088         header.append("_HPP_\n\n");
00089

00092         header.append("#include \"Plan.hpp\"\n\n");
00093

00095         header.append("using namespace util_ag;\n\n");
00096

00098         header.append("{\n\n");
00099

00101         path.append(file_name);
00102         path.append(".hpp");
00103         std::ofstream file_output(path.c_str());

00105         file_output.close();

00162 void Builder_code::generate_footer_header() const
00163 {
00164         string footer("/**\n  * Main class of GenEvalMag.\n  */\n");
00165         footer.append("class ");
00166         footer.append(file_name);
00167         footer.append("\n{\n");
00168 
00169         footer.append("  private:\n");
00170         footer.append("    vector <Visit_sequence> v_seq;\n\n");
00171         footer.append("    vector <Order_rule> contexts_rule;\n\n");
00172         footer.append("    vector <Rule> rules;\n\n");
00173         footer.append("    /* \"ro\" function. Wuu Yang's paper. */\n");
00174         footer.append("    vector <Plan> eval_plans;\n\n");
00175         footer.append("    /* \"theta\" function. Wuu Yang's paper. */\n");
00176         footer.append("    vector <Plan_project> eval_plans_project;\n\n");
00177         footer.append("    void add_plan(const Key_plan &k_plan, unsigned short index_order);\n");
00178         footer.append("    void add_plan_project(const Key_plan_project &k_plan_p, unsigned short index_order);\n");
00179         footer.append("    void compute_eq(int num_eq, struct Node *root);\n");
00180         footer.append("    void traverse(struct Node *node, unsigned short order);\n");
00181         footer.append("    void eval_visiter(struct Node *root);\n\n");
00182 
00183         footer.append("  public:\n    ");
00184         footer.append(file_name);
00185         footer.append("();\n\n");
00186         footer.append("    void print_visit_seqs();\n\n");
00187         footer.append("    void translates_visit_segs();\n\n");
00188         footer.append("    void evaluator_mag(struct Node *root);\n\n");
00189         footer.append("};\n\n");
00190 
00191         footer.append("} /* end evalmag */\n\n");
00192 
00193         string name_upper(boost::to_upper_copy(file_name));
00194 
00195         footer.append("#endif /* _");
00196         footer.append(name_upper);
00197         footer.append("_HPP_ */\n\n");
00198 
00199         string path(path_output);
00200         path.append(file_name);
00201         path.append(".hpp");
00202         std::ofstream file_output(path.c_str(),ofstream::app);
00203         file_output.write(footer.c_str(),footer.size());
00204         file_output.close();

00226 template <class T> string write_vector_with_inic
00227 (
00228         string &text_buffer,
00229         const string name_vec,
00230         const size_t index,
00231         const vector <T> &vec,
00232         const string type_vec,
00233         const string type_array
00234 )
00235 {
00236         text_buffer.append("  ");
00237         text_buffer.append(type_array);
00238         text_buffer.append(" __");
00239         string name (name_vec);
00240 
00241         stringstream index_array;
00242         index_array << index;
00243         name.append(index_array.str());
00244 
00245         text_buffer.append(name);
00246         text_buffer.append("[] = ");
00247 
00248         text_buffer.append("{");
00249         for(size_t i(0); i < vec.size(); i++)
00250         {
00251                 stringstream item;
00252                 item << vec[i];
00253                 text_buffer.append(item.str());
00254                 if(i < vec.size() - 1)
00255                 {
00256                         text_buffer.append(",");
00257                 }
00258         }
00259         text_buffer.append("};\n  ");
00260 
00261         text_buffer.append(type_vec);
00262         text_buffer.append(" ");
00263         text_buffer.append(name);
00264         text_buffer.append("(__");
00265         text_buffer.append(name);
00266         text_buffer.append(", __");
00267         text_buffer.append(name);
00268         text_buffer.append(" + sizeof(__");
00269         text_buffer.append(name);
00270         text_buffer.append(") / sizeof(");
00271         text_buffer.append(type_array);
00272         text_buffer.append("));\n");
00273 
00274         return name;
00275 }

00306 string generate_key_plan(string &text, const string &n_key, const int &num_key, const Key_plan &k_p)
00307 {
00308         text.append("  Key_plan ");
00309         string name_key(n_key);
00310         stringstream str_index;
00311         str_index << num_key;
00312         name_key.append(str_index.str());

00317         text.append(context_index.str());
00318         text.append(", ");
00319         stringstream key_plan_index;
00320         key_plan_index << k_p.plan;
00321         text.append(key_plan_index.str());
00322         text.append(");\n");
00323 
00324         return name_key;

00356 string Builder_code::generate_initialize_plans() const
00357 {
00358         string text("  /**\n    * Initialize of Evaluation Plans.\n    */\n");
00359 
00360         int num_key = 0;
00361         for(map < Key_plan, unsigned short >::const_iterator it(b_plans.get_plans().begin()); it != b_plans.get_plans().end(); it++)

00371                 text.append(name_key);

00379 
00380                 num_key++;

00435 string Builder_code::generate_initialize_rules() const
00436 {
00437         string text("  /**\n    * Initialize of Rules of grammar.\n    */\n");
00438 
00439         const map<unsigned short, Rule> &rules = attr_grammar.get_rules();
00440         int index = 0;
00441         for (map < unsigned short, Rule >::const_iterator r_it (rules.begin()); r_it != rules.end(); r_it++)
00442         {
00443                 stringstream str_index;
00444                 str_index << index;
00445 
00446                 vector<const Symbol*> right_side_non_terminals(r_it->second.get_non_terminals_right_side());
00447                 vector<unsigned short> name_symbol_rule;
00448 
00449                 name_symbol_rule.push_back(r_it->second.get_left_symbol()->get_id());
00450                 for (size_t i(0); i < right_side_non_terminals.size(); i++)
00451                 {
00452                         name_symbol_rule.push_back(right_side_non_terminals[i]->get_id());
00453                 }
00454 
00455                 string name_vec(
00456                         write_vector_with_inic<unsigned short>(
00457                                 text,
00458                                 "rule_non_terminal_",
00459                                 index,
00460                                 name_symbol_rule,
00461                                 "Rule",
00462                                 "unsigned short"
00463                         )
00464                 );
00465 
00466                 text.append("  rules.push_back(");
00467                 text.append(name_vec);
00468                 text.append(");\n\n");
00469 
00470                 index++;
00471         }
00472         return text;
00473 }

00479 void Builder_code::generate_constructor() const
00480 {
00481         string cons_txt(file_name);
00482         cons_txt.append("::");
00483         cons_txt.append(file_name);
00484         cons_txt.append("()\n{\n");
00485 
00486         cons_txt.append(generate_initialize_context());
00487 
00488         cons_txt.append(generate_initialize_plans());
00489 
00490         cons_txt.append(generate_initialize_plan_proj());
00491 
00492         cons_txt.append(generate_initialize_v_seq());
00493 
00494         cons_txt.append(generate_initialize_rules());
00495 
00496         cons_txt.append("}\n\n");
00497 
00498         string path(path_output);
00499         path.append(file_name);
00500         path.append(".cpp");
00501         std::ofstream file_output(path.c_str(),ofstream::app);
00502         file_output.write(cons_txt.c_str(),cons_txt.size());
00503         file_output.close();
00504 }

00509 string Builder_code::generate_print() const
00510 {
00511         string text("void ");
00512         text.append(file_name);
00513         text.append("::print_visit_seqs()\n  {\n");
00514         text.append("  for(size_t i(0); i < v_seq.size(); i++)\n");
00515         text.append("  {\n");
00516         text.append("    cout << \"Visit Sequence Nro \" << i+1 << \": \";\n");
00517         text.append("    for(size_t j(0); j < v_seq[i].size(); j++)\n");
00518         text.append("    {\n");
00519         text.append("      cout << v_seq[i][j];\n");
00520         text.append("      if(j < v_seq[i].size() - 1)\n");
00521         text.append("      {\n");
00522         text.append("        cout << \", \";\n");
00523         text.append("      }\n");
00524         text.append("    }\n");
00525         text.append("    cout << \".\" << endl;\n");
00526         text.append("  }\n");
00527         text.append("}\n\n");
00528         return text;
00529 }

00534 string Builder_code::generate_translate() const
00535 {
00536         string text("void ");
00537         text.append(file_name);
00538         text.append("::translates_visit_segs()\n  {\n");
00539         text.append("  for(size_t v_s(0); v_s < v_seq.size(); v_s++)\n");
00540         text.append("  {\n");
00541         text.append("    for(size_t i(0); i < v_seq[v_s].size(); i++)\n");
00542         text.append("    {\n");
00543         text.append("      if(v_seq[v_s][i] > 0)\n");
00544         text.append("      {\n");
00545         text.append("        cout << \"Visit child \" << v_seq[v_s][i];\n");
00546         text.append("      }\n");
00547         text.append("      if(v_seq[v_s][i] == 0)\n");
00548         text.append("      {\n");
00549         text.append("        cout << \"Leave\";\n");
00550         text.append("      }\n");
00551         text.append("      if(v_seq[v_s][i] < 0)\n");
00552         text.append("      {\n");
00553         text.append("        cout << \"Compute \" << v_seq[v_s][i]*(-1);\n");
00554         text.append("      }\n");
00555         text.append("      if(i < v_seq[v_s].size() - 1)\n");
00556         text.append("      {\n");
00557         text.append("        cout << \", \";\n");
00558         text.append("      }\n");
00559         text.append("    }\n");
00560         text.append("    cout << \".\" << endl;\n");
00561         text.append("  }\n");
00562         text.append("}\n\n");
00563         return text;
00564 }
00565 
00569 string generate_return_index_context()
00570 {
00571         string text("unsigned short return_index_context(const Order_rule &context, const vector < Order_rule > &v_contexts)\n");
00572         text.append("{\n");
00573         text.append("  for(size_t i(0); i < v_contexts.size(); i++)\n");
00574         text.append("  {\n");
00575         text.append("    if(context == v_contexts[i])\n");
00576         text.append("    {\n");
00577         text.append("      return i;\n");
00578         text.append("    }\n");
00579         text.append("  }\n");
00580         text.append("  return USHRT_MAX;\n");
00581         text.append("}\n\n");
00582         return text;
00583 }
00584 
00588 string Builder_code::generate_traverse() const
00589 {
00590         string text("void ");
00591         text.append(file_name);
00592         text.append("::traverse(struct Node *node, unsigned short order)\n");
00593         text.append("{\n");
00594         text.append("  Order_rule context;\n");
00595         text.append("  context.push_back(node->rule_id);\n");
00596         text.append("  for(size_t i(0); i < node->childs.size(); i++)\n");
00597         text.append("  {\n");
00598         text.append("    context.push_back(node->childs[i]->rule_id);\n");
00599         text.append("  }\n");
00600         text.append("  unsigned short index_context(return_index_context(context, contexts_rule));\n");
00601         text.append("  if(index_context == USHRT_MAX)\n");
00602         text.append("  {\n");
00603         text.append("    cerr << \"ERROR: the AST input is wrong create. Context rule does not exist.\" << endl;\n");
00604         text.append("    exit(-1);\n");
00605         text.append("  }\n");
00606         text.append("  Key_plan k_plan(index_context, order);\n");
00607         text.append("  bool find_plan(false);\n");
00608         text.append("  for(size_t i(0); i < eval_plans.size(); i++)\n");
00609         text.append("  {\n");
00610         text.append("    if (eval_plans[i].first == k_plan)\n");
00611         text.append("    {\n");
00612         text.append("      node->visit_seq_index = eval_plans[i].second;\n");
00613         text.append("      node->pos_visit_seq = 0;\n");
00614         text.append("      find_plan = true;\n");
00615         text.append("      break;\n");
00616         text.append("    }\n");
00617         text.append("  }\n");
00618         text.append("  if(!find_plan)\n");
00619         text.append("  {\n");
00620         text.append("    cerr << \"ERROR: the AST input is wrong create. Evaluation plan does not exist.\" << endl;\n");
00621         text.append("    exit(-1);\n");
00622         text.append("  }\n");
00623         text.append("  Rule &rule(rules[node->rule_id - 1]);\n");
00624         text.append("  for(size_t i(0); i < node->childs.size(); i++)\n");
00625         text.append("  {\n");
00626         text.append("    Key_plan_project k_plan_proj(k_plan, rule[i+1], i);\n");
00627         text.append("    for(size_t j(0); j < eval_plans_project.size(); j++)\n");
00628         text.append("    {\n");
00629         text.append("      if (eval_plans_project[j].first == k_plan_proj)\n");
00630         text.append("      {\n");
00631         text.append("        traverse(node->childs[i], eval_plans_project[j].second);\n");
00632         text.append("        break;\n");
00633         text.append("      }\n");
00634         text.append("    }\n");
00635         text.append("  }\n");
00636         text.append("}\n\n");
00637         return text;
00638 }
00639 
00643 string generate_expr_text(const Expression *node, const Rule &rule)
00644 {
00645         string expr;
00646         const Expr_function *func(dynamic_cast<const Expr_function*>(node));
00647         if(func)
00648         {
00649                 if (!func->get_function()->is_operator())
00650                 {
00651                         expr.append(func->get_function()->get_name());
00652                         expr.append("(");
00653                         for (size_t i(0); i < func->get_childs().size(); i++)
00654                         {
00655                                 expr.append(generate_expr_text(func->get_child(i), rule));
00656                                 if (i < func->get_childs().size() - 1)
00657                                 {
00658                                         expr.append(", ");
00659                                 }
00660                         }
00661                         expr.append(")");
00662                 }
00663                 else
00664                 {
00665                         if(func->is_infix() || func->is_postfix())
00666                         {
00667                                 expr.append("(");
00668                                 expr.append(generate_expr_text(func->get_child(0), rule));
00669                                 expr.append((func->is_postfix())? ") ": " ");
00670                         }
00671 
00672                         expr.append(func->get_function()->get_name());
00673 
00674                         if(func->is_infix() || func->is_prefix())
00675                         {
00676                                 expr.append((func->is_prefix())? " (": " ");
00677                                 unsigned short index_child((func->is_prefix())? 0: 1);
00678                                 expr.append(generate_expr_text(func->get_child(index_child), rule));
00679                                 expr.append(")");
00680                         }
00681                 }
00682         }
00683         else
00684         {
00685                 const Expr_literal *lit(dynamic_cast<const Expr_literal *>(node));
00686                 if(lit)
00687                 {
00688                         expr.append(lit->to_string());
00689                 }
00690                 else
00691                 {
00692                         const Expr_instance *ins((const Expr_instance *) node);
00693 
00694                         if (ins->get_symb()->equals(*rule.get_left_symbol()) && (ins->get_num() == 0))
00695                         {
00696                                 expr.append("node->");
00697                         }
00698                         else
00699                         {
00700                                 expr.append("((");
00701                                 expr.append(ins->get_symb()->get_name());
00702                                 expr.append("*)node->childs[");
00703                                 unsigned short index = ins->get_num();
00704 
00705                                 if(ins->get_symb()->equals(*rule.get_left_symbol()))
00706                                 {
00707                                         /* It should consider that the left instance has zero index. */
00708                                         index--;
00709                                 }
00710                                 const vector<const Symbol*> vec(rule.get_non_terminals_right_side());
00711                                 for(size_t j(0); j < vec.size(); j++)
00712                                 {
00713                                         if (vec[j]->equals(*ins->get_symb()))
00714                                         {
00715                                                 if (index == 0)
00716                                                 {
00717                                                         stringstream ins_index;
00718                                                         ins_index << j;
00719                                                         expr.append(ins_index.str());
00720                                                         break;
00721                                                 }
00722                                                 index--;
00723                                         }
00724                                 }
00725                                 expr.append("])->");
00726                         }
00727                         expr.append(ins->get_attr()->get_name());
00728                 }
00729         }
00730         return expr;
00731 }
00732 
00736 string Builder_code::generate_all_methods_eqs() const
00737 {
00738         string text;
00739         const map <unsigned short, Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00740         for(map <unsigned short, Rule>::const_iterator r_it(rules.begin()); r_it != rules.end(); r_it++)
00741         {
00742                 const map <unsigned short, Equation> &eqs(r_it->second.get_eqs());
00743 
00744                 const Symbol *symb_rule(r_it->second.get_left_symbol());
00745 
00746                 for(map <unsigned short, Equation>::const_iterator eq_it(eqs.begin()); eq_it != eqs.end(); eq_it++)
00747                 {
00748                         stringstream str_i_eq;
00749                         str_i_eq << eq_it->second.get_id();
00750                         text.append("// Eq ");
00751                         text.append(cleaning_tabs(eq_it->second.to_string()));
00752                         text.append("\nvoid compute_eq_");
00753                         text.append(str_i_eq.str());
00754                         text.append("(struct Node *root)\n");
00755                         text.append("{\n  ");
00756                         text.append(symb_rule->get_name());
00757                         text.append(" *node((");
00758                         text.append(symb_rule->get_name());
00759                         text.append("*) root);\n");
00760 
00761                         const Expr_instance *ins_left(eq_it->second.get_l_value());
00762 
00763                         if (ins_left->get_symb()->equals(*symb_rule))
00764                         {
00765                                 text.append("  node->");
00766                         }
00767                         else
00768                         {
00769                                 text.append("  ((");
00770                                 text.append(ins_left->get_symb()->get_name());
00771                                 text.append("*)node->childs[");
00772                                 unsigned short index = ins_left->get_num();
00773                                 const vector<const Symbol*> vec(r_it->second.get_non_terminals_right_side());
00774                                 for(size_t j(0); j < vec.size(); j++)
00775                                 {
00776                                         if (vec[j]->equals(*ins_left->get_symb()))
00777                                         {
00778                                                 if (index == 0)
00779                                                 {
00780                                                         stringstream ins_index;
00781                                                         ins_index << j;
00782                                                         text.append(ins_index.str());
00783                                                         break;
00784                                                 }
00785                                                 index--;
00786                                         }
00787                                 }
00788                                 text.append("])->");
00789                         }
00790                         text.append(ins_left->get_attr()->get_name());
00791                         text.append(" = ");
00792 
00793                         string text_expr(generate_expr_text(eq_it->second.get_r_value(), r_it->second));
00794                         text.append(text_expr);
00795                         text.append(";\n");
00796                         text.append("}\n\n");
00797                 }
00798         }
00799         return text;
00800 }
00801 
00806 string Builder_code::generate_all_compute_eq() const
00807 {
00808         string text("void ");
00809         text.append(file_name);
00810         text.append("::compute_eq(int num_eq, struct Node *root)\n");
00811         text.append("{\n");
00812         text.append("  switch ( num_eq ) {\n");
00813 
00814         for(size_t i(0); i < attr_grammar.get_count_eqs(); i++)
00815         {
00816                 stringstream str_i;
00817                 str_i << i+1;
00818                 text.append("    case ");
00819                 text.append(str_i.str());
00820                 text.append(": compute_eq_");
00821                 text.append(str_i.str());
00822                 text.append("(root); break;\n");
00823         }
00824         text.append("    default: cout << \"ERROR: Fatal action.\" << endl;\n");
00825         text.append("  }\n");
00826         text.append("}\n\n");
00827         return text;
00828 }
00829 
00834 string Builder_code::generate_eval_visiter() const
00835 {
00836         string text("void ");
00837         text.append(file_name);
00838         text.append("::eval_visiter(struct Node *root)\n");
00839         text.append("{\n");
00840         text.append("  for(size_t i(root->pos_visit_seq); i < v_seq[root->visit_seq_index].size(); i++)\n");
00841         text.append("  {\n");
00842         text.append("    int item_visit(v_seq[root->visit_seq_index][i]);\n");
00843         text.append("    if (item_visit > 0)\n");
00844         text.append("    {\n");
00845         text.append("      eval_visiter(root->childs[item_visit - 1]);\n");
00846         text.append("    }\n");
00847         text.append("    else if (item_visit < 0)\n");
00848         text.append("    {\n");
00849         text.append("      compute_eq((item_visit * (-1)), root);\n");
00850         text.append("    }\n");
00851         text.append("    else\n");
00852         text.append("    {\n");
00853         text.append("      /* Saves the index of the current v_seq item. */\n");
00854         text.append("      root->pos_visit_seq = i+1;\n");
00855         text.append("      return;\n");
00856         text.append("    }\n");
00857         text.append("  }\n");
00858         text.append("}\n\n");
00859         return text;
00860 }
00861 
00866 string Builder_code::generate_evaluator() const
00867 {
00868         string text("void ");
00869         text.append(file_name);
00870         text.append("::evaluator_mag(struct Node *root)\n");
00871         text.append("{\n");
00872 
00873         text.append("  unsigned short order_init(");
00874         stringstream order_init_index;
00875         order_init_index << b_plans.get_init_order();
00876         text.append(order_init_index.str());
00877         text.append(");\n");
00878 
00879         text.append("  traverse(root, order_init);\n");
00880         text.append("  eval_visiter(root);\n");
00881         text.append("}\n");
00882         return text;
00883 }

00895         text.append("   eval_plans.push_back(plan);\n");

00919 void Builder_code::generate_methods() const
00920 {
00921         string methods_t;
00922 
00923         methods_t.append(generate_print());
00924 
00925         methods_t.append(generate_add_plan());
00926 
00927         methods_t.append(generate_add_plan_project());
00928 
00929         methods_t.append(generate_translate());
00930 
00931         methods_t.append(generate_return_index_context());
00932 
00933         methods_t.append(generate_traverse());
00934 
00935         methods_t.append(generate_all_methods_eqs());
00936 
00937         methods_t.append(generate_all_compute_eq());
00938 
00939         methods_t.append(generate_eval_visiter());
00940 
00941         methods_t.append(generate_evaluator());
00942 
00943         string path(path_output);
00944         path.append(file_name);
00945         path.append(".cpp");
00946         std::ofstream file_output(path.c_str(), ofstream::app);
00947         file_output.write(methods_t.c_str(),methods_t.size());
00948         file_output.close();
00949 }
00950 
00966 void Builder_code::generate_structs() const
00967 {
00968         string structs("/**\n  * Structs of the symbols.\n  */\n");
00969         string text_constructor("/**\n  * Constructors of structs of the symbols.\n  */\n");
00970         string text_to_string("/**\n  * To_string of structs of the symbols.\n  */\n");
00971 
00972         const map<string, Symbol> &symbol_non_terminals(attr_grammar.get_non_terminal_symbols());
00973 
00974         for(map<string, Symbol>::const_iterator it_symb(symbol_non_terminals.begin()); it_symb != symbol_non_terminals.end(); it_symb++)
00975         {
00976                 structs.append("typedef struct Symbol_");
00977                 structs.append(it_symb->second.get_name());
00978                 structs.append(": Node\n{\n");
00979 
00980                 text_to_string.append("string ");
00981                 text_to_string.append(it_symb->second.get_name());
00982                 text_to_string.append("::to_string() const\n{\n");
00983                 text_to_string.append("  string text(\"-- Values of symbol ");
00984                 text_to_string.append(it_symb->second.get_name());
00985                 text_to_string.append(":\\n\");\n");
00986 
00987                 const vector<const Attribute*> &attrs(it_symb->second.get_attrs());
00988                 for(size_t j(0); j < attrs.size(); j++)
00989                 {
00990                         structs.append("  ");
00991                         structs.append(attrs[j]->get_sort_type()->get_name());
00992                         structs.append(" ");
00993                         structs.append(attrs[j]->get_name());
00994                         structs.append(";");
00995                         structs.append("\n");
00996 
00997                         text_to_string.append("  text.append(\"   - Attribute ");
00998                         if(attrs[j]->is_synthetize())
00999                         {
01000                                 text_to_string.append("synthesized ");
01001                         }
01002                         else
01003                         {
01004                                 text_to_string.append("inherited ");
01005                         }
01006                         text_to_string.append(attrs[j]->get_name());
01007                         text_to_string.append(" = \");\n");
01008 
01009                         if(attrs[j]->get_sort_type()->is_type_basic())
01010                         {
01011                                 if((attrs[j]->get_sort_type()->get_name().compare("int") == 0) ||
01012                                    (attrs[j]->get_sort_type()->get_name().compare("float") == 0))
01013                                 {
01014                                         string name_sstr("str_");
01015                                         name_sstr.append(attrs[j]->get_name());
01016 
01017                                         text_to_string.append("  stringstream ");
01018                                         text_to_string.append(name_sstr);
01019                                         text_to_string.append(";\n  ");
01020                                         text_to_string.append(name_sstr);
01021                                         text_to_string.append(" << ");
01022                                         text_to_string.append(attrs[j]->get_name());
01023                                         text_to_string.append(";\n");
01024                                         text_to_string.append("  text.append(");
01025                                         text_to_string.append(name_sstr);
01026                                         text_to_string.append(".str());\n");
01027                                 }
01028                                 else if (attrs[j]->get_sort_type()->get_name().compare("bool") == 0)
01029                                 {
01030                                         text_to_string.append("  text.append((");
01031                                         text_to_string.append(attrs[j]->get_name());
01032                                         text_to_string.append(")? \"true\": \"false\");\n");
01033                                 }
01034                                 else
01035                                 /* The attribute is a string or a char. */
01036                                 {
01037                                         text_to_string.append("  text.append(");
01038                                         text_to_string.append(attrs[j]->get_name());
01039                                         text_to_string.append(");\n");
01040                                 }
01041                         }
01042                         else
01043                         {
01044                                 text_to_string.append("  text.append(");
01045                                 text_to_string.append(attrs[j]->get_name());
01046                                 text_to_string.append(".to_string());\n");
01047                         }
01048                         text_to_string.append("  text.append(\"\\n\");\n");
01049                 }
01050 
01051                 /* Generate constructor signature. */
01052                 structs.append("\n  Symbol_");
01053                 structs.append(it_symb->second.get_name());
01054                 structs.append("(const unsigned short &r_id);\n");
01055 
01056                 /* Generate constructor method. */
01057                 text_constructor.append(it_symb->second.get_name());
01058                 text_constructor.append("::Symbol_");
01059                 text_constructor.append(it_symb->second.get_name());
01060                 text_constructor.append("(const unsigned short &r_id): Node(r_id){}\n\n");
01061 
01062                 /* Generate method to_string() */
01063                 structs.append("\n  string to_string() const;\n");
01064 
01065                 /* Generate recursive call to all childs. */
01066                 text_to_string.append("  for(size_t i(0); i < childs.size(); i++)\n  {\n");
01067                 text_to_string.append("    text.append(childs[i]->to_string());\n  }\n");
01068                 text_to_string.append("  return text;\n");
01069                 text_to_string.append("}\n\n");
01070 
01071                 structs.append("} ");
01072                 structs.append(it_symb->second.get_name());
01073                 structs.append(" ;\n\n");
01074         }
01075 
01076         string path_header(path_output);
01077         path_header.append(file_name);
01078         path_header.append(".hpp");
01079         std::ofstream header_output(path_header.c_str(),ofstream::app);
01080         header_output.write(structs.c_str(), structs.size());
01081         header_output.close();
01082 
01083         string path_code(path_output);
01084         path_code.append(file_name);
01085         path_code.append(".cpp");
01086         std::ofstream code_output(path_code.c_str(),ofstream::app);
01087         code_output.write(text_constructor.c_str(), text_constructor.size());
01088         code_output.write(text_to_string.c_str(), text_to_string.size());
01089         code_output.close();
01090 }
01091 
01096 bool Builder_code::generate_code(const vector<string> &headers_file, const string path) const
01097 {
01098         generate_header_file();
01099         generate_code_file(headers_file);
01100 
01101         generate_structs();
01102         generate_constructor();
01103         generate_methods();
01104 
01105         generate_footer_header();
01106         generate_footer_code();
01107 
01108         if (!copy_static_code(path_output, path))
01109         {
01110                 cout << "* Generation code ---------- [ FAIL ]" << endl;
01111                 return false;
01112         }
01113 
01114         cout << "* Generation code ---------- [  OK  ]" << endl;
01115         return true;
01116 }
